segments.text: Bill , will you be free at noon ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need a new filing cabinet in the office . Could you go downtown with me after lunch ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Have you got an idea about what type to buy ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the same as the one we have . And we also need some small articles in the office , such as pens , clips , erasers and sticky notes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Susan has already given me a list of all the stationery which we need to buy .
segments.speaker: S1
